original_title: Laugfs reduces the prices of LP Gas
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Laugfs Gas has decided to reduce the prices of its domestic gas cylinders with effect from midnight on Tuesday (4).
A 12.5kg cylinder will be reduced by Rs. 1,290/- and the new price will be Rs. 3,990/-
A 5kg cylinder will be reduced by Rs. 516/- and the new price will be Rs. 1,596/-
